sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: In Portal statistic, when user add new chart, statistic filter will displays default 5 custom string fields CustomVarCharField1 to CustomVarCharField5 , you can customize them by your own custom string fields.

sect2.title: Customization
sect2.para: Create an override which overrides sub process createDefaultStatisticCustomField() in Portal Kit. This sub process return a list of custom string fields. Follow instruction to create default custom fields.
